sentences.en: " The midwest,'said William Allen white, " is on the rampage again. "
sentences.cn: 威廉?艾伦?怀特说: “ 中西部再次暴跳起来. ”

sentences.en: Bad news for residents in the Midwest trying to cope with flooding.
sentences.cn: 对和洪流搏斗的中西部的民众,坏消息接踵而至.

sentences.en: But in the Midwest, you may expect a lot of rain.
sentences.cn: 可是中西部很可能阴雨连绵.

sentences.en: Environmental groups in Nevada and the Midwest have issued similar ultimatums.
sentences.cn: 内华达和中西部的环保团体也发布了类似的最后通牒.

sentences.en: In the mid - 1930 s a series of dry years resulted in extreme crop losses in the Midwest.
sentences.cn: 20世纪30年代 中期 连年干旱,使中西部的农作物受到严重损失.

sentences.en: Is that how you hail them in the Midwest?
sentences.cn: 在中西部你就是这样挥手致意的?

sentences.en: Jews in the Midwest were probably not keen about advertising their affiliation.
sentences.cn: 在中西部的犹太人大概并不热心于宣传他们的身份.

sentences.en: Residents in the Midwest are getting ready for another blast of winter.
sentences.cn: 中西部地区的居民正在准备迎接另一场冬季寒流的来袭.

sentences.en: Speaking in the Midwest state of Michigan Friday, Mr.
sentences.cn: 星期五, 布什先生在中西部地区的密歇根州发表了一次演说.

sentences.en: The flooding of the American Midwest broke all records in July, 1993.
sentences.cn: 美洲中西部的洪水泛滥破坏了1993年7月的所有记录.

sentences.en: The merger is structured as a reverse takeover of Midwest.
sentences.cn: 合并采取的是“反向收购”中西部公司的形式.

sentences.en: This area includes the OhaioBelly and parts the other Midwest.
sentences.cn: 这一区域包括俄亥俄峡谷和中西部高地的部分地方.

sentences.en: This area includes the Ohio Valley and parts of the Upper Midwest.
sentences.cn: 这些地区包括俄亥俄山谷和中西部地区.

sentences.en: This area includes the Ohio Valley and parts of Upper Midwest.
sentences.cn: 这个区域包括俄亥俄山谷和部分中西部北部地区.

sentences.en: This area includes the OhioValley and parts of the Upper Midwest.
sentences.cn: 该种植带包括:俄亥俄山谷地区和部分上中西部部分地区.

trans.tran_en: The Midwest is the region in the central part of the United States and north of Texas
